duties_responsibilities.duty: Performs diagnostic activities and services/repairs automotive systems.
Road tests automobiles before and after service work, and performs inspections on assigned vehicles.
Explains mechanical diagnoses and repairs to non-mechanical individuals, reports findings to service management.
Maintains service center standards of cleanliness, orderliness, and appearance of space and equipment in the service department.
Complies with company safety policy and federal/state OSHA safety requirements.
Performs other duties as assigned for the orderly management of the store.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 3 years of automotive repair experience, completion of Vocational-Technical School program in a related field or demonstrated skills via third party certificates/assessment.
A.S.E. certification in at least 3 (three) of A1-A8 is preferred. Will accept equivalent external qualifications or training certifications.
Must have a valid automobile driver’s license and maintain Federal, State and Local certification/license where applicable.
